Welcome to slogstorm’s documentation!¶

Main module¶

This module provides the main simulation classes.

InputHandler() provides the main user interface. It can be used to start a simulation, generate a terrain, deploy animals, modify parameters etc.

See the docstrings from the different classes and methods for more detailed documentation.

class slogstormpakke.slogstorm.Graphics[source]¶

Handles the graphics display.

Parameters: interval (new update interval, in years, optional.

Return value: current update interval.

class slogstormpakke.slogstorm.InputHandler(mapstr=None, mapfile=None)[source]¶

Handles the user input and serves as the main user interface.

Initialize InputHandler object.

Parameters: mapstr (string describing the map. See below) mapfile (location of file containing mapstr)

One of the parameters must be given.

mapstr should be a multiline string containing upper case letters O, J, S, D and M, representing the different region types. All lines must have the same number of letters. Along the edge, there should be only O’s.

Example mapstr:

“OOOOOO
OJSJSO OSSSSO OSDDSO OMMDMO OOOOOO”
deploy_animals(deployments)[source]¶

Deploy animals on the terrain.

Parameters: deployments (list containing deployments (see example below), optional)

Example: deploy_animals([{‘loc’: (2, 2), ‘pop’: [{‘species’: ‘Herbivore’, ‘age’: 10, ‘weight’: 18.0}]},

{‘loc’: (2, 2), ‘pop’: [{‘species’: ‘Herbivore’, ‘age’: 3, ‘weight’: 22.5}]}, {‘loc’: (2, 2), ‘pop’: [{‘species’: ‘Carnivore’, ‘age’: 5, ‘weight’: 15.2}]}, {‘loc’: (2, 2), ‘pop’: [{‘species’: ‘Carnivore’, ‘age’: 11, ‘weight’: 10.7}]}])
make_film(filename=None)[source]¶

Make movie from saved figures.

Parameters: filename (name of movie file, optional)

run_simulation(years, file_name_base=None)[source]¶

Run the main _simulation loop in the simulator object.

Parameters: years (number of years to simulate, required) file_name_base (str containing base of image file name, optional.

If omitted, images are not saved.)
set_carnivore_luminance_scale(vmax, vmin=0)[source]¶

Set the colorbar restraints for the carnivore map.

Parameters: vmax (max value, required) vmin (min value, optional, default = 0)

vmax should be set approximately to the expected maximum number of carnivores in any single cell / region. vmin should usually be set to 0.

Parameters: parameters (dict containing parameters to change from default values,

optional)

Set the colorbar restraints for the herbivore map.

vmax should be set approximately to the expected maximum number of herbivores in any single cell / region. vmin should usually be set to 0.

Animal module¶

This module provides the animal classes.

Animal() serves as a superclass for specific animal types. It should usually not be instantiated directly. Instead, the subclasses Herbivore() and Carnivore() should be instantiated.

class slogstormpakke.animaltypes.Animal(weight, age=0)[source]¶

Represents an animal.

Superclass for specific animal types.

Initialize an animal object.

Parameters: weight (required) age (optional)

age()[source]¶

Return animals age.

aging()[source]¶

Age the animal by one year.

birth(animal_count_in_region)[source]¶

Determine if animal will give birth.

Parameters: animal_count_in_region (# of herbivores in the same region, required)

birthloss()[source]¶

Cause animal to loose weight after giving birth.

death()[source]¶

Determine if animal dies.

fitness()[source]¶

Return animals fitness.

last_moved()[source]¶

Return when animal was last moved.

migrate()[source]¶

Determine if animal is able to migrate.

update_fitness()[source]¶

Update animals _fitness variable.

This method will call the method new_fitness() in the cython module fitness.pyx.

Should be called every time age or weight is changed.

static update_params(params)[source]¶

Static method for updating parameters of the Animal class.

This method is not really needed, as subclasses have their own static methods for updating parameters. It is here just to keep pylint from complaining.

weight()[source]¶

Return animals weight.

weightgain(weight)[source]¶

Cause animal to gain weight.

Parameters: weight (weight to gain, required)

weightloss()[source]¶

Cause animal to loose weight.

Parameters: herbivores (list of herbivores in the region, required)

static update_params(params)[source]¶

Static method for updating parameters of the Carnivore class.

Parameters: params (dictionary with all carnivore parameters, required)

class slogstormpakke.animaltypes.Herbivore(weight, age=0)[source]¶

Represents a herbivore.

Parameters: weight (required) age (optional, default = 0)

The animal will eat, increasing its weight.

Parameters: amount (amount to eat in int/float, required)

Static method for updating parameters of the Herbivore class.

Parameters: params (dictionary with all herbivore parameters, required)

Region module¶

This module provides the region classes.

Region() serves as a superclass for specific animal types. It should usually not be instantiated directly. Instead, the subclasses should be instantiated.

class slogstormpakke.regiontypes.Desert[source]¶

Represents a square dessert region in the terrain.

Initialize a dessert region.

nutrition_cycle()[source]¶

Do one cycle (one year) of nutrition uptake.

class slogstormpakke.regiontypes.Region(herbivores=None, carnivores=None)[source]¶

Represents a square region in the terrain.

Superclass for specific region types.

Initialize a region.

Parameters: herbivores (list of herbivore objects, optional) carnivores (list of carnivore objects, optional)

Do one cycle (one year) of aging.

breeding_cycle()[source]¶

Do one cycle (one year) of breeding.

Return list of carnivores in region.

color()[source]¶

Return color to represent region in map.

death_cycle()[source]¶

Do one cycle (one year) of death.

deploy(animal)[source]¶

Deploy animal if possible.

Will raise an error if animal was not accepted.

dispatch(animal)[source]¶

Remove animal from region.

herbivores()[source]¶

Return list of herbivores in region.

migration_cycle(terrain, current_year)[source]¶

Do one cycle (one year) of migration.

Parameters: terrain object (pointer to terrain object, required) current_year (curent year, required)

move(animal, current_year)[source]¶

Accept new animal if possible.

Return True if animal was accepted, False otherwise.

nutrition_cycle()[source]¶

Do one cycle (one year) of nutrition uptake.

This method is overloaded in certain subclasses.

regrowth_cycle()[source]¶

Do one cycle (one year) of regrowth.

This method is overloaded in certain subclasses.

Do one cycle (one year) of weightloss.

Random generator module¶

This module provides a random generator interface.

NumPy’s random generators is used by default, but may be replaced by another.

slogstormpakke.slump.randint(vmax)[source]¶

Return a (pseudo)randomly selected int between 0 and vmax.

slogstormpakke.slump.random()[source]¶

Return a (pseudo)random float in the interval [0, 1).

slogstormpakke.slump.seed(seedvalue)[source]¶

Set the seed value for the random generator.

Fitness module¶

This module provides a function that will return the fitness of an animal.

slogstormpakke.fitness.new_fitness()¶

Return new fitness for animal.
